author: Cecelia Jenkins
title: Prosciutto, Apple, and Goat Cheese Salad with Fig Vinaigrette
ingredients: 1 apple , cored, halved, and sliced thin
½ cup blanched hazelnuts , toasted and chopped coarse
6 ounces thinly sliced prosciutto , torn into bite-size pieces
instructions_list: Whisk oil, vinegar, preserves, salt, and pepper together in bowl.

Toss mesclun, apple, hazelnuts, and 6 tablespoons vinaigrette together in large bowl. Divide salad evenly among 4 dinner plates. Top each salad with 1½ ounces prosciutto and ¼ cup goat cheese. Serve, passing remaining vinaigrette separately.
description: Prosciutto, apple, and goat cheese salad topped with a homemade fig vinaigrette offers a delightful mix of sweet, savory, and tangy flavors in every bite.
